name: Queen Suriyothai
what_did:
Queen Suriyothai bravely rode into battle to protect her husband, the king, during a war with Burma.
She wore armor and joined the fight on an elephant.
She gave her life to save the king and the kingdom.
why_matters:
She is remembered for her great courage and love for her family and country.
Her story shows how Thai women have also been strong and heroic.
